name: Tower Drunkfense
description:
Tower Drunkfence is a game made for Gamemaker Toolkit's 48 hour Gamejam.

This game was made by one person, which includes all of the assets within it. 

The theme of the Jam was "Out of Control"

In tower Drunkfence you play as a barkeeper within a tower defense game, needing to grab hungover Dwarves from the medical tent to set them up where you'd like them to go. However one cannot control Dwarves, you can only entice them, and how you do that is with beer.

 You can keep them interested by delivering them beer from the local tavern, however if you don't serve them enough, they will go out of your control, quitting and returning to the tavern to drink on their own. 

With art inspired by the tower defense games of flash from a decade ago, I was hoping to bring back at least some small feeling of nostalgia

I had a blast making this game, it was my first time doing art and ever making music, and I hope you might enjoy it as well.
